title: Amazon to begin testing AI tools for film and TV production next month
description: Amazon MGM Studios will reportedly begin a closed beta program in March to test its AI tools to help with film and TV production.
content: Amazon MGM Studios will reportedly begin a closed beta program in March to test its AI tools to help with film and TV production.
